sector_performance.tooltip: Stress if construction_gdp is negative for 2 consecutive quarters.

labour_cost.tooltip: Stress if Construction Unit Labour Cost (ULC) YoY growth ≥ 8% for 2 consecutive quarters.
labour_cost.note: Missing latest quarter for unit_labour_cost_construction; defaulted to Normal.

interest_rate.tooltip: Stress if SORA overnight is above its 5-year 80th percentile AND the 6-month change ≥ +0.75pp.

materials_price.tooltip: Watch if any listed construction material price index rises by ≥ 8% YoY for 2 consecutive months.
materials_price.note: All materials series missing required t-12/t-13 lags; defaulted to Normal.
